name: DATE FIGHT - A Weird Dating RPG
name_original: DATE FIGHT - A Weird Dating RPG
description:
A very weird dating RPG where you can meet dinosaurs, witches and aliens.

Date a wide cast of randomly generated characters, all of whom are weird af!

Features

- Plenty of moves to learn.
- Hilarious randomly generated characters and dialogue!
- 5 boss dates.
- Weird random events such as meeting dinosaurs and aliens!
